page.title: 13RECREATION FOR THE YOUNG
page.content: {Children}tend to{stay at home}watching { T.V. }or{playing}with their{computers as there are{not many organised { facilities}for them. We have{3 parks. One has{playground facilities}and a {paddling pool.}The{pool}being{most {popular}with{small children}in the {summer.}While the{children}have the {time}of{their life}in the{pool,}the Mums{relax reading}or{sunbathing.}The remaining{2 parks}have{less playground {facilities}but have{football pitches. For{children}of{11}and{over}there is {pool}and{video games}at the{fish'n {chip shop.}It is{20p.}for a{game}of {pool}and{10p.}for the{video games. Because of the{lack}of{facilities}for the{teenagers}many stay in the{ chip {shop}for up to{3 hours.}The{shop}is only{open 4 days}a{week}so the {teenagers roam}the{streets.
